snippet: The Nashville Predators suspended Alexander Radulov and Andrei Kostitsyn, two of their top scorers in the postseason, for violating team rules.
abstract: The Nashville Predators suspended Alexander Radulov and Andrei Kostitsyn, two of their top scorers in the postseason, for violating team rules.

headline.main: Predators Suspend Two for Game 3 Against Coyotes
